content:
I'd be happy to help you find more information about the author.

Can you please provide me with more details about the article, such as:

1. The title of the article
2. The author's name (if you know it)
3. Any specific quotes or phrases that stood out to you from the article

With this information, I can try to help you find more about the author, their background, and their work on the topic of social media's impact on mental health.

Additionally, you can also try checking The New Yorker's website or archives to see if they have a bio or profile page for the author, or if they've written other articles on similar topics.

Let me know how I can assist you further!
